TopicTitle: Cant change focus with double click

Articles.Content:
In map mode (not the tracking station), I cannot focus on other plants/moons. I zoom out and double-click on another planet and nothing happens. Now, if I click on the Sun, the focus changes to that and If I am able to click on the planet mass NOT the circle icon that labels the planet, the focus changes. 

 

NOTE: I can also use TAB/SHIFT+TAB to change focus to all planets/moons.
